summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Specifies the compression control mode for a Dolby AC-3 or Dolby Enhanced AC-3 audio stream. This enumeration is used with the AVDecDDOperationalMode property.

member.name: eAVDecDDOperationalMode.eAVDecDDOperationalMode_NONE
member.summary: No dynamic range control or dialogue normalization (dialnorm). This mode should be used only for signal tests.

member.name: eAVDecDDOperationalMode.eAVDecDDOperationalMode_LINE
member.summary: Line mode. Dialnorm is enabled with a reference level of -31 decibels full scale (dBFS). Dynamic range control is applied, and high-level/low-level scaling is enabled. To set the high-level scaling factor, set the AVDecDDDynamicRangeScaleHigh property. To set the low-level scaling factor, set the AVDecDDDynamicRangeScaleLow property.

member.name: eAVDecDDOperationalMode.eAVDecDDOperationalMode_RF
member.summary: RF mode. Dialnorm is enabled with a reference level of -20 dBFS. Dynamic range control is applied. High-level/low-level scaling is disabled; instead, the maximum dynamic range reduction is applied.

member.name: eAVDecDDOperationalMode.eAVDecDDOperationalMode_PORTABLE8
member.summary: Dialnorm enabled, dialogue at -8dBFS. Dynamic range and compression used. High-level/low-level scaling is not allowed (always fully compressed).

member.name: eAVDecDDOperationalMode.eAVDecDDOperationalMode_PORTABLE11
member.summary: Dialnorm enabled, dialogue at -11dBFS. Dynamic range and compression used. High-level/low-level scaling is not allowed (always fully compressed).

member.name: eAVDecDDOperationalMode.eAVDecDDOperationalMode_PORTABLE14
member.summary: Dialnorm enabled, dialogue at -14dBFS. Dynamic range and compression used. High-level/low-level scaling is not allowed (always fully compressed).
